member.name: MFSensorDeviceMode
member.summary: Specifies the sharing mode of an .

member.name: MFSensorDeviceMode.MFSensorDeviceMode_Controller
member.summary: The device is in controller mode, which means its settings can be modified.

member.name: MFSensorDeviceMode.MFSensorDeviceMode_Shared
member.summary: The device is in shared mode, which means its settings can't be modified.
